long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension for use on the Aurorachan imageboard.

Features:
• Auto-update threads without refreshing the browser page
• Hover over backlinks to preview linked posts
• View replies to posts
• Notifies when new posts have been loaded
• Bottom Bar shows auto-update countdown and post count
• Hide posts irrelevant to your conversation

Changelog:

• Post filtering added back in

• Fixed titles not appearing on posts
